sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog
      v-model="show"
      max-width="500px"
    >
      <template v-slot:activator="{ on, attrs }">
        <v-btn
          color="primary"
          dark
          class="mb-2"
          v-bind="attrs"
          v-on="on"
        >
          {{ $t('new-item', {'item': name} ) }}
        </v-btn>
      </template>
      <v-card>
        <v-card-title>
          <slot name="title"></slot>
          
        </v-card-title>

        <v-card-text>
          
          <slot name="middle"></slot>

        </v-card-text>

        <v-card-actions>

          <slot name="actions"></slot>
          
        </v-card-actions>
      </v-card>
    </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import Form from './Form';

export default {
    components: { 
        'ue-form': Form
    },
    name: 'ue-form-dialog',
    props: {
      value: {
        type: Boolean,
        default: false
      },
      name: {
        type: String,
        default: "Item"
      }
    },
    data() {
      return {
        // show: this.dialog,
      }
    },

    computed: {
      show: {
        get () {
          __log(this.value)
          return this.value
        },
        set (value) {
          this.$emit('input', value)
        }
      }
    },

    methods: {
      close() {
        this.dialog = false
        this.$nextTick(() => {
          this.editedItem = Object.assign({}, this.defaultItem)
          this.editedIndex = -1
        })
      }
    }
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
